'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|landmass]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
A short length of sparsely populated volcanic islands on the southeastern end of [[Magran's Teeth]]. It lays roughly between the [[Kua o Rikuhu Islands]] and Magran's Teeth proper, and is bordered by the [[Ofecchia Channel]].

==Points of interest==
* [[Kua o Rikuhu Islands]] lies to the south, consisting of most of the inhabited islands in the northeast.
* [[Ofecchia Channel]] and the islands beyond to the east.
